moreBlocks.articles:
• Car Accident
    Our law firm represents victims of Florida car accident claims. If you were injured in a car accident in Florida, call us for a free consultation as soon as possible to find out about important rights you may have.
  • Personal Injury
    Personal injury generally refers to any injury to the person caused by the negligence of another. It falls under Florida's tort law. If you were injured in Florida as a result of an accident or negligence, call Florida attorney Jason Turchin.
  • Crime Victims Rights
    Many crimes are often preventable. We are crime victim's rights advocates and attorneys who represent many crime victims.
  • Wrongful Death
    Florida wrongful death attorney Jason Turchin has represented many families who lost loved ones due to the negligence of another. If you lost a loved one and someone else may be at fault, call Jason Turchin for a free consultation at (800) 337-7755.
  • Cruise Injuries
    If you were injured on a cruise, you may be entitled to money damages and other damages if the cruise line was negligent and contributed to your injuries.

description:
I am attorney Jason Turchin. My law firm, the Law Offices of Jason Turchin, helps those who have sustained a personal injury in an accident or have been the victim of a crime. With offices throughout southern Florida, I provide comprehensive legal representation to clients in Weston, Miami, Key West, Orlando and surrounding communities. My law firm also maintains satellite offices in New York City and Washington, D.C. Even if you live outside of Florida but were injured in our state, my law firm's experience with the Florida legal system can be highly beneficial to your case.

When clients contact me for a free initial consultation, it can be for a number of reasons. Many have suffered of a personal injury through the negligence of others. Some retain me as counsel because a loved one has been the victim of a wrongful death, and yet others were the target of a heinous crime. When a serious incident such as a personal injury, death or crime happens to you or a loved one, life can come to a screeching halt. It is highly important to contact a qualified law firm as soon as possible. While you and your family work on putting your life back together and healing, I will work on obtaining justice for your legal matter. I fight on your behalf to obtain the best compensation available for your case.

Throughout my legal career, I have handled more than 4,500 accident and personal injury cases. My clients have come to rely on my in-depth knowledge and experience as a means to obtain the best results possible for their specific legal circumstances.

The Law Offices of Jason Turchin offers free consultations to all personal injury and crime victim clients. Evening or weekend appointments are available upon request.
